      class  MetaSamples
      Same thing as Samples but with some other useful metadata as well as variables scripts can use

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Samples.layerOnThis(Samples toLayer)
      Layer another sample onto this one
      Redirect with 0 offset
      void Samples.layerOnThis(Samples toLayer, double offset1, double offset2)
      Layer another sample onto this one
      Offset is time in seconds
      void Samples.layerOnThisLazy(Samples toLayer)
      Layer another sample onto this one lazily
      Redirect with 0 offset
      void Samples.layerOnThisLazy(Samples toLayer, int offset1, int offset2)
      Layer another sample onto this one lazily
      Offsets are in values/samples, not seconds
      First offset is offset in this
      Second offset is offset in samples to layer
      Tries to do full layering
